title: Test

summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP has increased over the Year
Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP is rapidly constant from 2000/01 to 2018/19.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.

Min Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP about 1.29 was recorded at Year 2002/03
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009/10 to 2018/19.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2002/03 to 2005/06.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2007/08 to 2009/10.
But, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2005/06 to 2007/08.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2000/01 to 2002/03.
